org.rsna.ctp

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rsna.ctp.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    The class that encapsulates the configuration of the system. The configuration is specified by the config.xml file, which must be located in the root directory of the application. This class is a singleton. Instances of this class must be obtained through the static getInstance() method.

      • registerStage

        public void registerStage(PipelineStage stage)
        Register a PipelineStage using its id attribute so that other components can access it. The stage is registered only if its id attribute is not null and has at least one non-whitespace character.
        Parameters:
        stage - the stage to be registered.

      • registerStage

        public void registerStage(PipelineStage stage,
                 java.lang.String id)
        Register a PipelineStage using a supplied id value. The stage is registered only if the supplied id is not null and has at least one non-whitespace character.
        Parameters:
        stage - the stage to be registered.
        id - the id under which to register the stage.

      • getRegisteredStage

        public PipelineStage getRegisteredStage(java.lang.String id)
        Get a registered PipelineStage from the stages table.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the PipelineStage to be returned.
        Returns:
        the registered PipelineStage with the specified ID, or null if no stage with that ID has been registered.

      • registerPlugin

        public void registerPlugin(Plugin plugin)
        Register a Plugin so that other components can access it. The plugin is registered only if its id is not null and has at least one non-whitespace character.
        Parameters:
        plugin - the plugin to be registered.
